## NgSelectComponent.\_registerNewPlugin() method

Registers newly created plugin

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected _registerNewPlugin(plugin: NgSelectPlugin, pluginKey: string, pluginName: keyof NgSelectPluginTypes): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  plugin | [NgSelectPlugin](./select.ngselectplugin.md) | Plugin to be registered |
|  pluginKey | string | Key of plugin used for pluginInstances |
|  pluginName | keyof [NgSelectPluginTypes](./select.ngselectplugintypes.md) | Name property for plugin from options |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
